basetrainer.engine.comm module¶

This file contains primitives for multi-gpu communication. This is useful when doing distributed training.

basetrainer.engine.comm.all_gather(data, group=None)¶

Run all_gather on arbitrary picklable data (not necessarily tensors). :param data: any picklable object :param group: a torch process group. By default, will use a group which

contains all ranks on gloo backend.

返回

list of data gathered from each rank

返回类型

list[data]

basetrainer.engine.comm.gather(data, dst=0, group=None)¶

Run gather on arbitrary picklable data (not necessarily tensors). :param data: any picklable object :param dst: destination rank :type dst: int :param group: a torch process group. By default, will use a group which

contains all ranks on gloo backend.

返回

on dst, a list of data gathered from each rank. Otherwise,

an empty list.

返回类型

list[data]

basetrainer.engine.comm.get_device(device_ids: list) → torch.device¶
basetrainer.engine.comm.get_local_rank() → int¶
返回

The rank of the current process within the local (per-machine) process group.

basetrainer.engine.comm.get_local_size() → int¶
返回

The size of the per-machine process group, i.e. the number of processes per machine.

basetrainer.engine.comm.get_rank() → int¶
basetrainer.engine.comm.get_world_size() → int¶
basetrainer.engine.comm.is_main_process() → bool¶
basetrainer.engine.comm.reduce_dict(input_dict, average=True)¶

Reduce the values in the dictionary from all processes so that process with rank 0 has the reduced results. :param input_dict: inputs to be reduced. All the values must be scalar CUDA Tensor. :type input_dict: dict :param average: whether to do average or sum :type average: bool

返回

a dict with the same keys as input_dict, after reduction.

basetrainer.engine.comm.shared_random_seed()¶
返回

a random number that is the same across all workers.

If workers need a shared RNG, they can use this shared seed to create one.

返回类型

int

All workers must call this function, otherwise it will deadlock.

basetrainer.engine.comm.synchronize()¶

Helper function to synchronize (barrier) among all processes when using distributed training

basetrainer.engine.launch module¶

@author: xingyu liao @contact: sherlockliao01@gmail.com

basetrainer.engine.launch.launch(main_func, num_gpus_per_machine, num_machines=1, machine_rank=0, dist_url=None, distributed=True, args=())¶

Launch multi-gpu or distributed training. This function must be called on all machines involved in the training. It will spawn child processes (defined by ``num_gpus_per_machine`) on each machine. :param main_func: a function that will be called by main_func(*args) :param num_gpus_per_machine: number of GPUs per machine :type num_gpus_per_machine: int :param num_machines: the total number of machines :type num_machines: int :param machine_rank: the rank of this machine :type machine_rank: int :param dist_url: url to connect to for distributed jobs, including protocol

e.g. “tcp://127.0.0.1:8686”. Can be set to “auto” to automatically select a free port on localhost

参数

  • distributed – running Mode True use DistributedDataParallel(DDP), multi-gpu-distributed training； Fase use DataParallel(DDP), only multi-gpu training(DP)

  • args (tuple) – arguments passed to main_func
